description:
This is Udemy's #1 best-selling Neuro Linguistic Programming course.  Material in this program was updated as recently as the 15th of May 2016, so join 4,000+ other students enrolled in this life-changing NLP Self-Esteem Coaching course.   

Stop Questioning Yourself  and Start Shining! 

Simple and profound exercises that will significantly impact your level of confidence and self-esteem.  In this course I'll personally coach you through simple research-validated techniques that will;

  • Make you bold and confident
  • Make you decisive and focused
  • Make you feel poised in times of uncertainty
  • Make you a more dynamic version of yourself
  • Make you more attractive to yourself
  • Make you more attractive to others
  • Make you appear more qualified and in-charge


This course is a bridge between the Ivory Tower and Main Street - translating rigorous NLP coaching research into actionable exercises for a dynamic life!

Don't waste another minute wondering if you should enroll. There is absolutely zero risk on your part!  With this course you'll receive a 30-day no-questions-asked guarantee.  If for any reason this program does not help you to feel more confident, bold and decisive, simply return it to Udemy for a 100% full refund...it's that simple!

So join 4,000 fellow students in this NLP learners community and start shining today! 

__________________________

NLP stands for Neuro (science the nervous system) Linguistic (science of language and its impact on results) Programming (conditioning for desired results)
title: NLP Techniques: Radiate Self Esteem NLP Confidence Coaching
instructors: NLP, Positive Psychology Coach Patrick Howell, Braco Pobric
